job_description:
About the job
This job is sourced from a job board. Learn More
Job Title

ICT & Design Technology Teacher

Department

Academics

II. JOB PURPOSE 
The role holder is responsible –
For delivering classroom instruction that helps students learn and excel.
For developing student’s abilities and interest through creative activities.

Iii. Key Responsibilities

Functional

Subject Knowledge and Methodological Competence

 Understanding curriculum standards and Principles of Computer Sciences.
 Creating stimulating lesson plans to foster maximum student’s engagement in Computer Science.
 Providing opportunities for study and creativity within a global context that will stimulate and challenge students developing the skills necessary for independent and lifelong learning
 Adjusting teaching practices to support differentiated learning.
 Enabling students to apply and use a body of knowledge, methods and techniques that characterize Computer Science
 Developing experimental and investigative scientific skills including the use of current technologies
 Engendering an awareness of the need for, and the value of, effective collaboration and communication in resolving complex problems
 Developing logical and critical thinking as well as experimental, investigative and problem-solving skills
 Developing and applying the students’ information and communication technology skills in the study of computer science to communicate information confidently and effectively
 Raising awareness of the moral, ethical, social, economic and environmental implications of using science and technology
 Developing an appreciation of the possibilities and limitations associated with continued developments in IT systems and computer science
 Encouraging an understanding of the relationships between scientific disciplines and the overarching nature of the scientific method
 Willing to teach Computer Science/ ICT/ Digital Literacy across the age and ability ranges from Cambridge Lower Secondary (Grades 6 - 8) through to IGCSE (Grades 9 & 10).
Demonstrates the necessary subject knowledge and methodological strategies to effectively educate students.
Assists in managing curriculum and study courses for the students’ development.
Provides students with structure and support in a safe learning environment to enable them to develop socially, emotionally and morally.
Introduces new study patterns among the students to develop their interest and do regular studies.
Gives practical analysis of the courses to create interest.
Develops the lesson plan in accordance with the curriculum guidelines, and presents the lesson plans to the academic coordinators for approval.
Plans lessons based on inquiry, focussed on conceptual understanding, differentiated to meet the needs of all learners and informed by assessment (formative and summative)
Reviews the feedback from the academic coordinators and revises the lesson plans accordingly
Keeps up to date with the latest teaching aids, such as the use of technology in classroom learning, and integrate these into the teaching process
Creates challenging and engaging learning opportunities for students, and fosters a classroom atmosphere that is conducive for learning
Develops worksheets, handouts, and other learning materials in line with the lesson plan and curriculum, as well as the assessments and examinations.
Responsible for the timely marking and correction of assignments completed by the students

Organizational Competence

 Creates a well-organized, orderly and task-oriented learning environment.
 Assesses students’ progress and reports to the principal about them. Conduct assessment tests to evaluate students’ progress
 Assesses, records and reports on the development, progress and results of students
 Identifies students who may require additional assistance, academic or non-academic, and ensures they receive the necessary support
 Contributes to extra-curricular activities and participates in school activities such as assemblies, meetings and conferences
 Ensures the safety of students at all times

Reflection And Development

 Reflects regularly on the development of personal and professional capabilities.
 Communicates the development of students to the Coordinator & Principal.

Interaction

Focussed on effective teamwork and collaboration

Collaborates with other teachers to share new ideas, teaching approaches, content and professional knowledge
Communicates and provides feedback to the parents during the Parent Teacher Meetings, and whenever necessary

Interpersonal Competence

Creates an atmosphere of trust by dealing with students in a positive and open way.
Ensures open communication channel and coordination with parents and others involved in the education and development of the students.
Enables students understand their strengths and weaknesses in order to support their learning and personal development.

Iv. Job Requirements

Minimum Qualifications

 Graduate / Bachelor in Education (Specialisation in Subject for Middle teacher & senior teacher)
 Preferred Masters in the desired Subject with International Teaching Qualification / Certificate that qualifies for accreditation according to IGCSE educational system OR Cambridge Curriculum.
 Computer literacy, is required to work on software.
 Fluent English Level: reading, writing, speaking; a professional command of the English language.
 Strong technology application skills.
 Ability to support Blended cum Hybrid Learning.
 Competent in applying the principles of Digital Pedagogy.

Experience

 3+ years of Teaching experience

V. KEY INTERACTIONS

Key Internal Contacts

Key External Contacts

Principal

Coordinators/ HODs

Other Non-academic Departments

Students

Parents

teaching computer science, Classroom, Modeling, Teaching, ICT, Curriculum Planning, Architect, Taskoriented, International Education, Information Technology, Computer Science, Design and Technology, Digital Literacy, Spreadsheets, Teaching Experience, Design Technology, ICT training, Technology, Computer Literacy, Technology Application

About the job
If you are a student, graduate or career change aspirant, and you are missing out on the skills to work in your dream job, this bootcamp is for you. Get trained and work on hands-on projects in our bootcamp to upskill yourself!

What you will get from this program?

– Four weeks hands-on training and projects – in a German AI startup

– Learn and work – directly with founders and potential clients from Germany

– Do practical group Project work and build up experience in product management

Modules
 Hands-on training and projects:
Get trained directly from the Chief Product Officer of Moyyn and get hands-on training and projects

– Setting up your own Java application for a recruitment platform

– Hands-on training on the consumption of REST API – ChatGPT and other APIs

– Development of AI-based matchmaking application

and many more exciting projects
 Backend Development Training:
8 hours training by experienced product managers incl. guest speakers from Europe

– Spring security

– CI/CD pipelines and many more

– CV preparation

– Cover letter preparation

– Interview tips

Why join our Java Backend Developer Training Program?

– Skill development: Learn the fundamentals of Backend Development

Bootcamp is a skill certification program.

About the job
This job is sourced from a job board. Learn More
Rider Operations & Experience Analyst, Logistics (Singapore)

“To be the most loved everyday food and groceries destination!” - that’s our mission at foodpanda (small ‘f’).

foodpanda is the largest food and grocery delivery platform in Asia, outside of China. Operating in more than 400 cities across 11 markets, we continue to expand and grow in our core food delivery business, as well as in new verticals like grocery deliveries, with a strong tech infrastructure at our core. From our restaurants-partners, cloud kitchens and cloud grocery stores — foodpanda is just one tap away, getting everything you need into your hands quickly and conveniently!

We are looking for enthusiastic problem solvers to join us in scaling our platform, to digitalise businesses in Asia, uplift rider livelihoods and build a hyper-convenient platform for our customers. If you love working with technology to create solutions and are not afraid to roll up your sleeves to get things done, you will find your tribe here at foodpanda. Our diverse and high-performing team comprises people from more than 60 nationalities, and we welcome all experiences, backgrounds, and perspectives.

As a Rider Operations & Experience Analyst, your role is to be the voice of riders in Singapore and improve their experience with foodpanda. You will also assist in tasks which ensure the smooth running of our day-to-day operations.

This role will be based in Singapore and will report to our Rider Operations Lead.

Responsibilities

Be the voice of our riders identifying their key issues and finding solutions to improve their overall satisfaction
Quality assurance of the Service team through regular communication and alignment with the Shared Service Center (SSC) leads
Design & maintain tracking mechanisms to capture the common quality issues and report and mitigate the top ones
Conduct tests and experiments to validate hypotheses and to measure the effectiveness of proposed improvements
Work with both internal and external partners to optimize overall operation through process development

Requirements

Bachelor’s degree in any discipline, preferably a STEM field, Economics or Business
Minimum 1-2 years of working experience in the tech industry. Applicants with minimal work experience but outstanding academic or co-curricular records are welcome to apply
High empathy to understand rider’s needs and their thinking process
Hands-on in Microsoft Excel and SQL
Knowledge of Google data studio and Tableau is a plus
Experience in prompt engineering and AI tools is a plus
Willing to question the status quo and contribute to ideas when needed
Team player and could fit into the company culture
Possess a strong problem-solving skills

What We Offer

A dynamic and challenging work environment
A company committed to developing you personally and professionally
A great working atmosphere with regular company and team events
A vibrant and international team committed to diversity and inclusion
Responsibility from day one in a fast growing and global company
Other benefits include free food, health and dental insurance, and learning and development opportunities!

Our parent company, Delivery Hero, is a global leader in the food delivery industry processing over 3 million orders every day and operating in 40+ markets in the world, with 18,000 employees and approximately 500,000+ restaurant partners.

Please apply directly via the link here: https://grnh.se/49a150201us

Tableau, Grocery, Microsoft Excel, Data Analysis, Analytical Skills, Quality Assurance, Economics, SQL, Python, Team Player

name_location: CREDIT AGRICOLE CORPORATE AND INVESTMENT BANK · Singapore, Singapore  2 weeks ago  · 14 applicants
job_description:
About the job
This job is sourced from a job board. Learn More
Number of opening : 1

Internship duration : Jan to Jun 2024

Who We Are

Crédit Agricole Corporate and Investment Banking (CA-CIB) is the CIB arm of Crédit Agricole Group, world’s 11th largest bank by total assets.

Our Singapore Center Is One Of The 3 Main IT Hubs For CA-CIB's Worldwide Business. We Work Daily With International Branches Located In 33 Countries By

 Envisioning and preparing the Bank’s futures information systems.
 Partnering and supporting core banking flagships and transverse areas in their large scale development projects.
 Providing premium In-house Banking applications.

This unique positioning empowers us to bring our core banking business a sustainable competitive advantage on the market.

We seek innovative and agile people sharing our mindset to support ambitious and forthcoming technological challenges.

The Department and position

The department is responsible for development and maintenance of Capital Market applications used by worldwide users.

The candidate will be involved with many front line IT professionals who understand the nature of business operations, timing of activities & data flowing through internal and external systems. The candidate will also be in touch with business users, infrastructure engineer and system managers.

The candidate will join the Singapore Capital Market CIBOS (Calypso as International Back-Office System) team in charge of supporting the Back Office (BO) system used for Foreign eXchange and Money Markets activities. The team is managing the interfaces with various upstream and downstream system and also of key BO tasks such as Confirmations, Payments, Regulatory Reporting, Accounting and Reconciliation reports.

The team works closely with other upstream and downstream systems such as – Front Office applications (BLOFI, KONDOR+, OMEGA, ORCHESTRADE…), Back-Office applications (SUMMIT…), Teams managing referencial Market data (CARD, SDI, MDA Bond…) and Middle-Office Systems (RTP, GLORY, RDJ...)

Mission

As an intern, your mission is to become a valuable asset to our organization by:

Interacting Comfortably with People: Building strong collaborative relationships within the team and stakeholders.
Automation and Development: Demonstrating a deep passion for development, specially in Technologies: Java, Oracle, Shell Scripting, SQL
Database: Oracle
CI/CD Tools : GIT, Maven, ANT, Jenkins, Gradle
Interest in Bank activities: Apetite to understand the business activities of the bank on Capital Markets.
Process automation: Appetite for continuous improvement and automation. Of new as well as existing process to enhance efficiency and reduce the TAT.
During your internship, you will have the opportunity to:
Learn about Capital Market Back Office activities: interfacing with different upstream and down stream systems, handling of client confirmation and payments, accounting entries generation, transactional reporting, Regulatory requirements and purpose of reconciliation activities b/w FO & BO – opportunity to learn end-to-end investment banking workflows.
On the job training to directly apply your learning and be impactful.
Gain insights into Software Development, understand the SDLC and its real-life implementation.
Collaborate with Subject Matter Experts, including Business Analysts, Support Analysts, Developers, DevOps Engineers, etc.
Benefit from the guidance of a dedicated mentor.
Deliver on jobs that directly impact the banks day-to-day activities and witness the added value of your job directly from business lines.
Learn on a one of the leader Capital Market software: CALYPSO.

Qualifications And Profile

Candidates should have:

Understanding of Object Oriented analysis and design using common design patterns.
Java, SQL, and UNIX/LINUX Scripting skills.
Basic understanding of the Spring Framework, Microservices architecture and API.
Excellent Aptitude, Curious to learn and inquisitive.
Excellent communication and interpersonal skills.
Autonomous, self motivated and excellent team player.
Fluency in English - as acting in a multi-cultural environment.

The scope will be adapted depending on the situation and the progress of the trainee.

Education & Work Experience

Bachelor’/ Master’s degree in Computers Science/IT or equivalent domain.

Shift Timings

Asia shift works from 9AM to 6:30PM SGT.

Application Process

Interested students will need to apply via below link

https://app.jobvite.com/j?cj=o3VvofwB&s=URL

Interested students will need to complete an aptitude/personality test during the application process.
Desired Skills and Experience
TensorFlow, Process Automation, Oracle, Design Patterns, Investment Banking, Agile, Scripting, Upstream, SDLC, Maven, SQL, Accounting, Capital, Java, Research Design, Software Development

job_description:
About the job
This job is sourced from a job board. Learn More
Job Summary: We are seeking dedicated and knowledgeable Freelance Educational Tutors to provide personalized academic support and guidance to students of various age groups and educational levels. As a freelance educational tutor, you will work independently, tailoring your teaching methods to meet the unique needs of each student. This role is ideal for educators, subject matter experts, and individuals passionate about helping students achieve their learning goals.

Responsibilities 
Assess Student Needs:
Conduct initial assessments to understand the student's academic strengths, weaknesses, and learning objectives.
Identify the specific subject areas or skills that require improvement.
Develop Customized Learning Plans:
Create personalized learning plans that address the individual needs and goals of each student.
Select appropriate teaching materials, resources, and educational tools to support the tutoring process.
Provide One-on-One Instruction:
Deliver instruction in the identified subject areas, helping students grasp complex concepts and improve their academic performance.
Adapt teaching methods to accommodate various learning styles and pace.
Set Clear Learning Objectives:
Establish clear and measurable learning objectives with each student.
Monitor progress and adjust teaching strategies as necessary to achieve these objectives.
Homework Assistance:
Assist students with homework assignments, projects, and exam preparation.
Offer guidance on study techniques, time management, and organizational skills.
Communication and Feedback:
Maintain open and effective communication with students and their parents or guardians.
Provide regular feedback on students' progress and areas for improvement.
Record Keeping:
Keep accurate records of tutoring sessions, including notes on lesson content and student performance.
Prepare progress reports for students and parents as required.
Subject Expertise:
Stay up-to-date with the latest curriculum changes, teaching methods, and educational trends related to your area of expertise.
Time Management:
Manage your own schedule effectively to accommodate students' availability.
Meet punctuality and time commitments for tutoring sessions.

Requirements

A bachelor's degree in the relevant subject area or a closely related field. Advanced degrees are a plus.
Proven expertise and proficiency in the subject(s) you will be tutoring.
Prior teaching, tutoring, or educational experience is preferred.
Strong interpersonal and communication skills to effectively interact with students and their families.
Patience, empathy, and the ability to adapt teaching methods to individual student needs.
Reliable internet access and a computer or device for online tutoring if applicable.
Flexibility in scheduling to accommodate students' availability, including evenings and weekends.
Background check and references may be required.
Any relevant teaching certifications or qualifications are advantageous.

As a Freelance Educational Tutor, you have the opportunity to make a significant impact on students' academic success and personal development. Your dedication to helping students achieve their learning goals and your subject expertise will contribute to their educational journey. Contact Edmund @ 81289449
Desired Skills and Experience
Verbal Communication, Teaching, Arranging, Mathematics, Tuition, Tailoring, Attention to Detail, Time Management, Writing, Communication Skills, Scheduling, Personal Development, Tutoring

job_title: Research Assistant (English Language and Literature Academic Group)[NIE]
name_location: Nanyang Technological University Singapore · Singapore, Singapore  1 week ago  · 30 applicants
job_description:
About the job
The National Institute of Education invites suitable applications for the position of Research Assistant on a 16-month contract at the English Language and Literature Academic Group.

Project Title: Reading Southeast Asia in the World (1967 – 1990) [NIE-SUG 4-23 AASL]

Project Introduction: This research project aims to address a crucial gap in current Southeast Asian literary scholarship. Anglophone writing from various countries in the region is typically studied within a national tradition dating from post-independence, which obscures literary exchanges that give rise to Southeast Asia as a broader literary unit. In response, the data generated from this project will provide a clear and holistic picture of how Southeast Asian Anglophone writers are received and studied, in order to theorise Southeast Asia more rigorously as a unit of literary study.

This Project Will Generate a Holistic Picture Of The Intra- And Extra-regional Publication And Reception Of Anglophone Southeast Asian Writers Through The Following Means

Collection of quantitative data about the number, frequency and genre of publication
Collection of qualitative data
Scans of selected scholarly journals
Interviews with scholars and researchers
University curricula on Southeast Asian writing

Requirements

A basic degree from a reputable university in literature, literary studies, history or a related field
Relevant research experience
Good interpersonal communication and writing skills Expertise in Microsoft applications (Word, Excel, PowerPoint)
Able to work independently with minimal supervision
Able to work cooperatively in teams Proactive, willing to learn, reliable and able to manage concurrent tasks in a timely manner
Experience with data analysis and publications an advantage
Background knowledge of Southeast Asia or the literary histories of one or more ASEAN countries an advantage
Fluency in one other Southeast Asian language (Malay, Filipino, Mandarin Chinese, Bahasa Indonesia) an advantage

Responsibilities

Conduct literature reviews
Assist with data collection, interview transcription, processing and analysis
Assist in the administration and management of project
Assist in writing of reports
Maintain and document research records
Other tasks as assigned by the Principal Investigator

Application

Applicants (external and internal) will apply via Workday. We regret that only shortlisted candidates will be notified.

Closing Date

Closing date for advertisements will be set to 14 calendar days from date of posting.

Hiring Institution: NIE

name_location: Singapore Airlines · Singapore, Singapore  1 week ago  · 48 applicants
job_description:
About the job
Job Description

The core mission of Singapore Airlines (SIA) Digital Innovation Lab (DIL), also known as KrisLab, is to drive the digital innovation strategies and initiatives, enabling SIA Group to be the leading digital airline. DIL is focused on building an innovation culture across SIA Group, solving business units’ challenges and building ideas to implementation.

SIA digital innovation is focused on delivering business impact at speed through partnerships with Business Units (BUs) and global innovation communities and innovators. A strong, execution-focused team that drives innovation from an idea through prototype development, Proof of Concepts (POC) to validate business case and technology feasibility and to launch an idea to the market is critical.

Role

Your role as a Technology Development Engineer is to drive the development of digital ideas submitted by SIA Group staff and also through the BUs through DIL innovation programs to deliver impactful business outcomes and support the building of an innovation culture in SIA Group. The role includes the following:

Technology Development and Support
Managing the ideation and prototyping process for digital ideas submitted by SIA Group staff and BUs, employing the build-measure-learn concept:
Manage the ideas pipeline, evaluate, groom, and validate ideas submitted
Validate ideas/prototypes through various means such as interviews, user testing
Partner with SIA Group staff and/or BUs to drive the articulation of impactful problem statements and design low-fidelity prototypes or wireframes for validation
Evaluate, engage and supervise the internal development resources, start-ups and/or technology partners to build high-fidelity prototypes
Prepare and assist staff with pitches to senior executives/management and key stakeholder
Perform overall project management for qualified ideas from prototyping through the MVP stages
 Design, set up and institutionalise the technology development standards, practices and processes for ideation, prototype and POC solutioning, put in place and manage the requisite digital toolboxes and sandboxes (hardware/software) in KrisLab to support such developmental and solutioning efforts
 Partnership Engagement to drive technology development
 Facilitate discovery of new and emerging technologies, articulate relevance and contextualise use cases to BUs
Coordinate with external open innovation communities and partners (e.g. Institutes of Higher Learning (IHL) research institutions, incubators and accelerators, VCs, etc.)
Business Engagement to drive corporate innovation and intrapreneurship
 Develop strong relationships with BUs and IT to establish deeper understanding and better articulation of business opportunities, customers’ and business pain points, immediate and longer-term business pain points and challenges

Required Skills

 A degree in a technology related discipline, preferably with good project management experiences applying Agile, Design Thinking, and Lean Start-up methodologies
 Execution-oriented, proven track record in executing projects
 Practical development experiences with programming in languages, e.g. JavaScript, Python and their related frameworks
 Fast and independent learner, proactive and willing to pick up new technical skillsets
 Good grasp of technologies (e.g. Augmented/Virtual/Mixed Reality, Internet-of-Things, 5G, Artificial Intelligence, Analytics, Blockchain, Metaverse) and their use cases
 Possess exceptional EQ and AQ, creative and passionate to see ideas become reality, strong facilitation, negotiation and influencing skills
 Possess ability to engage and communicate ideas and concepts simply and effectively across levels of the organisation
 Experiences working in start-ups, incubators and/or accelerators and/or aviation and travel industry will be advantageous
 Preferably with 2-5 years of related working experience. Fresh graduates are welcomed to apply.

About the job
The National Institute of Education invites suitable applications for the position of Research Associate on an 18-month renewable contract at the Office of Education Research, Center for Research in Pedagogy and Practice

Project Title: Data and Theory Driven Artificial Intelligence to Boost the Science of Learning

Project Introduction: This project will leverage on big data generated from online education platform approaches to build Science of Learning for effective education. The project will focus on: (1) literature review of current trends and findings for the role of Artificial Intelligence (AI) in Education, (2) implementing experimental studies for teaching and learning in mathematics in primary schools, (3) publication of research findings for different stakeholders including researchers, policymakers, and teachers.

Preferably with experience in social science research or education research
Proactive, eager to learn and perform

job_description:
About the job
This job is sourced from a job board. Learn More
Job Summary: As a Desktop Support Engineer, you will be responsible for ensuring the smooth operation of desktops, laptops, and peripheral devices. You will provide technical assistance, support, and guidance to end-users while maintaining the highest level of customer service. This role involves troubleshooting hardware and software issues, installing and configuring systems, and assisting with IT projects as needed.

Key Responsibilities

End-User Support:Provide prompt and effective technical support to end-users via phone, email, or in-person. Troubleshoot hardware and software issues related to desktops, laptops, printers, and other peripherals. Resolve technical problems with minimal disruption to workflow. 
Installation and Configuration:Install, configure, and maintain desktop operating systems (e.g., Windows, macOS). Set up and configure hardware components and software applications. Ensure that all systems are up-to-date with the latest patches and security updates. 
Hardware Maintenance:Diagnose and replace malfunctioning hardware components. Perform regular maintenance tasks such as cleaning and hardware upgrades. Keep an inventory of hardware assets and track equipment lifecycle. 
Software Support:Assist end-users with software installation, updates, and troubleshooting. Collaborate with the IT team to evaluate and recommend software solutions. Provide training to end-users on software applications as needed. 
Documentation:Maintain accurate records of support requests and resolutions. Create and update documentation for IT processes, procedures, and user guides. Contribute to the knowledge base to facilitate efficient issue resolution. 
Security and Compliance:Ensure that desktops and laptops are in compliance with company security policies. Assist in implementing security measures such as antivirus software and data encryption. Educate end-users on security best practices. 
Collaboration:Collaborate with other IT team members to resolve complex issues and implement IT projects. Work closely with third-party vendors and service providers when necessary. 

Qualifications

Bachelor's degree in Information Technology, Computer Science, or a related field (or equivalent experience).
Proven experience in desktop support or a similar role.
Strong knowledge of desktop operating systems (Windows, macOS).
Familiarity with hardware components and peripherals.
Excellent troubleshooting and problem-solving skills.
Strong communication and interpersonal skills.
Customer service-oriented with a patient and approachable demeanor.
IT certifications (e.g., CompTIA A+, Microsoft Certified Desktop Support Technician) a plus.

Desired Skills and Experience
MacOS, A+, Troubleshooting, Technical Assistance, Hardware, Laptops, Inventory, Information Technology, Approachable, Operating Systems, Windows, Customer Service, Software Installation, Encryption, Troubleshooting Hardware, Technical Support

Experience in working with either front end and/or back-end technologies and frameworks.
Experience in one or more Cloud Technologies
Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, or relevant disciplines in software design and development, or with coding knowledge


Eligibility

We welcome students from Engineering degrees with excellent academic records and encourage applicants from diverse backgrounds
Final year students, able to start July 2024
Permanent legal right to work in the country you’re applying to
We’re looking for team players who are agile, flexible, multi-tasking and open to learning latest tech stack


Exceptions

UK and UAE, we consider candidates requiring visa sponsorship. In the UAE, priority is given to UAE nationals 
US Graduate roles, we will not consider applicants seeking Optional Practical Training (OPT) or Curricular Practical Training (CPT) employment. 


About Standard Chartered

We're an international bank, nimble enough to act, big enough for impact. For more than 160 years, we've worked to make a positive difference for our colleagues, clients and communities. And we’re on a journey to be the world’s most sustainable and responsible bank.

We question the status quo, love a challenge and enjoy finding new opportunities to grow and do better than before. If you're looking for a career with purpose and you want to work for a bank making a difference, we want to hear from you. You can count on us to celebrate your unique talents. And we can't wait to see the talents you can bring us.

Our purpose, to drive commerce and prosperity through our unique diversity, together with our brand promise, to be here for good are achieved by how we each live our valued behaviours. When you work with us, you'll see how we value difference and advocate inclusion.

Together we:

Do the right thing and are assertive, challenge one another, and live with integrity, while putting the client at the heart of what we do
Never settle, continuously striving to improve and innovate, keeping things simple and learning from doing well, and not so well
Be better together, we can be ourselves, be inclusive, see more good in others, and work collectively to build for the long term


In line with our Fair Pay Charter, we offer a competitive salary and benefits to support your mental, physical, financial and social wellbeing.

Core bank funding for retirement savings, medical and life insurance, with flexible and voluntary benefits available in some locations
Time-off includes volunteering leave, maternity and parental leave for spouse/partner, compassionate leave, sabbatical leave, along with market competitive annual leave
Flexible working options based around home and office locations, with flexible working patterns
Proactive wellbeing support through Unmind, a market-leading digital wellbeing platform, development courses for resilience and other human skills, global Employee Assistance Programme, sick leave, mental health first-aiders and all sorts of self-help toolkits
A continuous learning culture to support your growth, with opportunities to reskill and upskill and access to physical, virtual and digital learning 
Being part of an inclusive and values driven organisation, one that embraces and celebrates our unique diversity, across our teams, business functions and geographies - everyone feels respected and can realise their full potential.


Recruitment assessments

Some of our roles use assessments to help us understand how suitable you are for the role you've applied to. If you are invited to take an assessment, this is great news. It means your application has progressed to an important stage of our recruitment process.

Responsibilities

CI/CD Pipeline Management:

Design, implement, and maintain end-to-end CI/CD pipelines to ensure smooth code integration, automated testing, and efficient deployment.
Utilize Jenkins or similar tools to automate the build, test, and deployment processes, ensuring consistent and reliable software releases.

Infrastructure Automation

Leverage Python and scripting expertise to automate infrastructure provisioning, configuration, and management.

Containerization And Orchestration

Utilize Kubernetes and Openshift to deploy, manage, and orchestrate containerized applications, ensuring scalability and high availability.
Implement containerization best practices and develop deployment strategies for microservices architectures.

Linux Administration

Utilize hands-on Linux experience to manage and maintain server environments, ensuring system stability, security, and performance.
Implement monitoring and alerting systems to proactively identify and address potential issues.

Database Management

Utilize SQL expertise to manage and maintain databases, write complex queries, and ensure data integrity and security.
Implement backup and recovery strategies to safeguard critical financial data.

Security And Compliance

Collaborate with security teams to implement best practices for securing both infrastructure and applications, including vulnerability assessments and access controls.
Ensure compliance with industry regulations and standards (e.g., PCI DSS) through continuous monitoring and auditing.

Collaboration And Communication

Work closely with development teams to integrate DevOps practices into the software development lifecycle, fostering a culture of collaboration.
Communicate effectively with cross-functional teams to ensure smooth deployment, troubleshooting, and resolution of technical issues.

Monitoring And Troubleshooting

Set up monitoring tools and dashboards to track system performance, availability, and resource utilization.
Analyze logs and metrics to diagnose issues, perform root cause analysis, and implement timely solutions.

Technical Documentation

Create and maintain comprehensive documentation for infrastructure, processes, and deployment pipelines.
Ensure documentation is up-to-date and accessible to team members.

Continuous Learning

Stay updated on emerging technologies and industry trends to identify opportunities for process improvements and innovation.
Proactively suggest and implement new tools and methodologies to enhance the DevOps workflow.

Qualifications

6-8 years of software development experience
Have experience in Python and good understanding of OOP Concepts
Have experience and understanding of CI/CD flow, Jenkins
Have hands-on experience in Linux
Well-versed with SQL commands and have a good understanding of data

Key Responsibilities

Test Planning: Participate in the planning and design phase of testing, collaborating with stakeholders to define test objectives, test scenarios, and test cases. Analyze system requirements, identify testable features, and create a comprehensive test plan.

Perform various types of testing such as functional testing, integration/interfaces testing, regression testing, performance testing, security testing, and user acceptance testing (UAT). Use both manual and automated testing techniques to verify the system's functionality,usability, and performance.

Strong knowledge of software testing concepts, techniques, and best practices
Experience in large scale and various types of testing, including functional testing, integration testing, regression testing, performance testing, security testing, and user acceptance testing (UAT).
Understanding of test automation tools and frameworks and hands[1]on experience in test automation
Familiarity with different software development methodologies such as Agile, Waterfall, or DevOps, and their impact on testing

Knowledge of databases and ability to write and execute SQL queries for data verification and validation

job_description:
About the job
This job is sourced from a job board. Learn More
Your Role

Want to work at one of the world’s leading financial services firms?

You’ll

 Gain invaluable hands-on experience working with business experts
 Get to know the markets from the capital raising stage to disposal
 Learn technical skills
 Provide M&A advice and learn how to work on spinoffs, takeovers, exchange offers, takeover defense and the formation of joint ventures
 Analyze corporate and financial information and build models to review financial performance and the value of companies
 Develop strategies to maximize our clients’ diverse objectives
 Develop your skill set through interactive, informative sessions and on-the-job trainings
 Join networking sessions to get to know your peers and expand your network

Your Team

You’ll be working within our Investment Bank’s Global Banking business where you’ll get to experience our culture and atmosphere by taking on the responsibilities of a full-time analyst. You’ll work closely with our Global Banking country and sector coverage teams, as well as our product teams. There, you'll learn how to provide coverage, about advisory, capital markets and financing solutions for corporate, financial institutions and sponsor clients.

Diversity helps us grow, together. That’s why we're committed to fostering and advancing diversity, equity, and inclusion. It strengthens our business and brings value to our clients.

Your Expertise

You need to be graduating in Dec 2024 to Jun 2025, and with less than two years of work experience. It doesn’t matter what you’re studying (it really doesn’t).

But we’d like to see evidence that you can:

 Analyze a problem, adopt a view and come to a decision
 Plan, organize and communicate well
 Make things happen
 Stick with a task
 Work in a team
 Come up with ideas

Perhaps you’ve organized a fundraising event or taken part in team sports? Or persevered and passed an exam in a subject you found challenging? Think about how things you’ve achieved match the skills we’re after.

Your Program

Be a real part of the team on this 10-week summer program. Work with our experts and learn about the industry, our clients, our firm and a specific area of it. You’ll have plenty of opportunities to develop new skills and expand your network. Also, with your new skills and experience you'll even get the chance to land a position in our Graduate Talent Program after you've graduated.

You can only apply for one program in one country within Asia Pacific during the same academic year.
Desired Skills and Experience
Excel Macro, Defense, Fundraising, Joint Ventures, Advanced Excel, Capital Markets, Capital Raising, Networking, Banking, Excel, Evidence, Excel VBA, Financial Services

name_location: PeopleScope (Asia) · Singapore, Singapore  1 week ago  · 50 applicants
job_description:
About the job
Your vendor of choice for staffing requirements in Asia

PeopleScope pride ourselves as being able to provide clients access to talent pools and networks across South East Asia, China, Taiwan, Hong Kong and Korea. The ability to attract and have access to talents across Asia Pacific put us in a unique position to be the vendor of choice for your staffing requirements.

We emphasize on two aspects – Clients’ Requirements and Talents’ Growth. Our solutions are specially tailored to ensure that our clients’ staffing requirements are being specifically met. We take special care of our talents who work with us, matching their aspirations to the career that they embark on.

The Role

What will you do?

If you are driven by a passion for technology and innovation, we look forward to receiving your application.

The Team spearheads the digital transformation of government, aiming to design and develop software applications that enhance the services provided by government agencies for the people of Singapore.

We are seeking passionate software developers who thrive on end-to-end software delivery and are eager to explore new technologies.

As a member of our cross-functional development team, you will be instrumental in ensuring the quality, automation, and user experience of the software we deliver.
Design and develop web frontend and backend applications, taking ownership of the software development process.
Create automated functional and unit tests for the code you develop to ensure high quality deliverables.
Develop backend APIs and databases to support the applications.
Leverage cloud technologies to design and develop scalable applications.
Collaborate with DevOps Engineers to implement build and release automation.
Engage in pair programming and code reviews to foster a collaborative and efficient development process.
Work closely with Product Manager, Business Analysts, Quality Engineers, and User Interface/User Experience Designers to deliver exceptional features.

Ideal Profile

What are we looking for?

Familiarity with front-end development framework such as React.js / Next.js.
Familiarity in server-side web application development using Node.js and Typescript.js.
Familiarity with working on CI/CD pipelines.
Familiarity with leveraging on cloud platforms such as Amazon AWS, Azure, or Google Cloud PlaYorm (GCP).
Familiarity with Javascript unit testing frameworks such as Jest or Mocha.
Familiarity with serverless technologies such as AWS Lambda, ECS.
Familiarity with Agile and Continuous Integration and Delivery Practices.
Familiarity with version control using Git.
Willingness to work on different platforms to contribute to a dynamic and cross functional team.
Strong fundamentals in Javascript & Typescript.
Familiarity with building reusable web components is advantageous.
Knowledge of search engine components and how they work (crawl, index, search).
Experience with Test-Driven Development and Behaviour-Driven Development.
Familiarity with Docker containers.
A collaborative team player with excellent interpersonal and presentation skills.

What's on Offer?

Work within a company with a solid track record of success
Excellent career development opportunities
Opportunity to make a positive impact

Are You Ready to Make It Happen at Mondelēz International?

Join our Mission to Lead the Future of Snacking. Make It With Pride.

Working as part of a cross-functional team you lead the RDQ activities required to complete new product development and maintain portfolios and/or productivity projects keeping in mind the goal to deliver the desired consumer experience.

How You Will Contribute

You will :

Work independently to plan, lead and coordinate technical projects in line with RDQ, marketing and manufacturing requirements
You will effectively communicate status and risks and plan, lead and coordinate pilot plant and factory trials in accordance with good manufacturing practice and HACCP requirements. name_location: NUVERSE PTE. LTD. · Singapore, Singapore  1 week ago  · 19 applicants
job_description:
About the job
This job is sourced from a job board. Learn More
About ByteDance

Founded in 2012, ByteDance's mission is to inspire creativity and enrich life. With a suite of more than a dozen products, including TikTok, Helo, and Resso, as well as platforms specific to the Chinese market, including Toutiao, Douyin, and Xigua, ByteDance has made it easier and more fun for people to connect with, consume, and create content. Why Join Us Creation is the core of ByteDance's purpose. Our products are built to help imaginations thrive. This is doubly true of the teams that make our innovations possible. Together, we inspire creativity and enrich life - a mission we aim to achieve every day. To us, every challenge, no matter how ambiguous, is an opportunity; to learn, to innovate, and to grow as one team. Status quo? Never. Courage? Always. At ByteDance, we create together and grow together. That's how we drive impact - for ourselves, our company, and the users we serve. Join us.

About The Team

The Game Technology team plays a significant role in the whole life cycle of the game. We are responsible for the development, testing, operation, SRE, and quality assurance of the user and operating system, and give strong support for game development and publishing. Providing comprehensive and systematical solutions supports the stable operation and commercialization of the game. - Deploy and configure solutions in the cloud. - Automate cloud operations, develop infrastructure automation scripts and participate in the continuous improvement of cloud solutions. - Participate in the specification, setup, and run Proof of Concepts and demonstrations of cloud solutions. - Administer and maintain servers across virtual platforms.

Qualifications

 Bachelor's degree or above in Computer Science or a related technical discipline and good English communication skills.
 Familiar with cloud computing technologies of Amazon Web Services, Google Cloud Platform and other suppliers.
 Possesses a strong sense of responsibility, a proactive team spirit, and a strong ability to comprehensively analyze and solve problems.

ByteDance is committed to creating an inclusive space where employees are valued for their skills, experiences, and unique perspectives. Our platform connects people from across the globe and so does our workplace. At ByteDance, our mission is to inspire creativity and enrich life. To achieve that goal, we are committed to celebrating our diverse voices and creating an environment that reflects the many communities we reach. We are passionate about this and hope you are too.
Desired Skills and Experience
Game Development, Troubleshooting, Kubernetes, Azure, Cloud Computing, Quality Assurance, Google Cloud Platform, Team Spirit, Scripting, Amazon Web Services, Administration, Publishing, Networking, Commercialization, Customer Focus, Linux

job_description:
About the job
This job is sourced from a job board. Learn More
About Us

Quintessential Education (QE) is Singapore’s leading provider of pre-tertiary academic programmes and university admissions advisory for IGCSE and IB students. Over the past 9 years, we have built a strong presence on a high-price, high-quality positioning. We are a fast-growing business looking for a dedicated and talented addition to our team. We are committed to providing an industry-defining service to help our students achieve academic excellence, ignite opportunities and guide them towards success.

We are looking for committed and talented additions to our team. As an ideal candidate, you should display a proven ability to develop and maintain an environment of trust, diversity, and inclusion within your community.

As part of the position, you will work with the founders, Ivy League and Oxbridge graduates and other high-performing teammates. You will help address students’ learning needs and academic success by providing guidance, review, and relevant help to students in a professional manner from beginning to end.

What You'll Learn

Build your teaching skills
Receive mentorship from senior tutors on good pedagogy and teaching methods
Take ownership and ensure that the teachings align consistently with the company’s teaching methodologies
Improve your presentation and communication skills
A fulfilling mentoring experience to make a difference in someone’s life

Job Responsibilities

The tutor is to conduct his or her duties in a professional manner. He or she must provide syllabus guidance, review of weak concepts, timed exam practices, and targeted homework and feedback to each student.

Job Requirements

We are seeking full-time or part-time junior tutors for IB/IGCSE Maths. One should have:

Excellent verbal and written communication in English
Good attitude and sense of responsibility
Keen eye for detail
Ability to teach both individual and group classes
Able to create resources
Tutors should ideally have relevant experience teaching Maths at IB, IGCSE, and/or MYP level
Fresh IB graduates are welcome
Proficient in Maths. Ideally, an IB graduate with a predicted score of >42 Points and 7 in Maths.

What Qualities We Are Looking

Good attitude to learn and improve
Keen eye for detail
Good time management and organization skills
Able to work independently
Provision of digitized notes to students for ease of revision
Sense of responsibility to nurture each student

Remuneration

Allowance: $50 per hour upwards

Commitment: Freelance, can start immediately. Full-time Conversion/ Internship available for discussion.

Office Location: 545 Orchard Road, #14-06/9, S238882

Interested parties should email their CV to hr@qeducation.sg. and complete this form at https://airtable.com/apppZiLoRbfaFu1Sw/shruJ0TBkGkDb8x2J.

Shortlisted candidates will be invited for interviews and assessments.

#education #IB #operations #QE #IGCSE #MYP #PYP #internationalschools

As a Quality Engineer, you will be part of an in-house team with the opportunity to accelerate the delivery and improve quality of the software we build.

Build advanced automated test suites to exercise our world-class applications

name_location: JCS BIOTECH PTE. LTD. · Singapore, Singapore  5 days ago  · 8 applicants
job_description:
About the job
This job is sourced from a job board. Learn More
We are a leading innovator in the healthcare technology sector, dedicated to developing cutting-edge medical equipment that improves patient care and outcomes. We are seeking a highly skilled and motivated Software Engineer to join our dynamic team and contribute to the design, development, and maintenance of software solutions for our medical devices.

Job Overview

As a Software Engineer specializing in medical equipment, you will play a crucial role in developing and maintaining software applications that drive the functionality and performance of our advanced medical devices. You will collaborate with cross-functional teams, including hardware engineers, regulatory affairs, and quality assurance, to ensure the seamless integration of software components into our products.

Job Responsibilities

Software Design and Development:
Design, develop, and maintain embedded software for medical devices.
Implement software solutions that adhere to industry standards and regulatory requirements.
Collaborate with hardware engineers to integrate software with medical equipment components.
System Integration:
 Work closely with cross-functional teams to ensure seamless software integration with hardware components.
 Conduct system-level testing and debugging to identify and resolve software-related issues.
Regulatory Compliance:
 Ensure that software development processes and documentation adhere to relevant medical device regulations (e.g., FDA guidelines).
 Participate in the preparation of regulatory submissions and support regulatory audits as needed.
Quality Assurance:
 Collaborate with the quality assurance team to develop and execute software test plans.
 Identify and address software defects and issues to ensure the reliability and safety of medical devices.
Documentation:
 Create and maintain comprehensive documentation for software design, development, and testing activities.
 Support the preparation of technical documentation required for regulatory submissions.

Qualifications

Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or a related field. Master’s degree preferred.
Proven experience in software development for medical devices or other regulated industries.
Proficiency in programming languages such as C, C++, and Python.
Experience with real-time operating systems (RTOS) and embedded systems.
Familiarity with medical device regulations and standards, such as ISO 13485.
Strong problem-solving and debugging skills.
Excellent communication and teamwork skills.

Desired Skills and Experience
RTOS, FDA, Embedded Software, Hardware, Quality Assurance, Regulatory Affairs, Software Engineering, Reliability, Embedded Systems, Software Design, Teamwork Skills, Regulatory Submissions, Software Development, C++

About GMG

GMG is a global well-being company retailing, distributing and manufacturing a portfolio of leading international and home-grown brands across sport, food and health sectors. Its vision is to inspire people to win in ways that make the world better. Today, GMG’s investments span across four key verticals: GMG Sports, GMG Food, GMG Health, and GMG Consumer Goods.  Understanding Business Priorities: Analyze company business priorities, requirements, structure, and processes to define the scope for innovative IT solutions.
 Project Monitoring and Reporting: Monitor and report on project progress, taking corrective actions when necessary to ensure on-time and within-budget deliverables.
 Testing and Integration: Oversee testing and system integration processes for applications to guarantee optimal performance.
 Knowledge Transfer: Ensure efficient knowledge transfer to the local support team upon implementation of new solutions.
 Change Management: Identify and plan change management activities for implementing approved new or alternative business processes.
 Application Support: Provide timely support for corporate applications, minimizing disruptions to business operations.
 Issue Resolution: Ensure the timely resolution of system issues/bugs, maintaining the quality of vendor support through regular assessments.
 Governance and Process Management:Establish governance and processes for managing change requests, and manage vendors to ensure timely project deliverables.
 End User Training:Facilitate periodic end-user training sessions as necessary.
 ERP Management (Oracle NetSuite): Oversee and manage the group's ERP system, ensuring its optimal functioning and alignment with business goals.
 Lifecycle Management: Manage the end-to-end lifecycle of internal applications and processes, from gathering and documenting requirements to implementation and ongoing improvements.
 Documentation and Education: Document processes, applications, and integrations, educating users on best practices.

Basic Qualifications

 Previous job experience with a similar job scope, specializing in IT/Computer.
 Experience in System / Database Administration or equivalent
 Bachelor's degree in Computer Science/Information Systems.
 A flexible approach to working practices and excellent prioritization skills.
 Proficiency in Oracle NetSuite.
 Experience in ERP optimization would be advantageous.

Join us in this exciting opportunity to contribute to the success and efficiency of our organization through innovative IT solutions and expert analysis. If you are a dedicated IT professional ready for a challenging role, we invite you to apply and become a valued member of our team.
Desired Skills and Experience
Oracle, Analytical Skills, Change Management, Interpersonal Skills, ERP, System Integration, SQL, Database Administration, Application Support, Business Analyst, Business Requirements

Functionally reports to the Big data platform owner under Group Infrastructure Platform Services, the Platform engineer (Big Data platform) will be responsible for ensuring the uptime, performance and compliance of Cloudera Data Platform, Cloudera Data Services and its runtime components in accordance to the bank standard.

This role will be responsible for the operations and automation of the data platform. They will collaborate with Plan, Build, Change and Run teams on top of Application and Development teams on big data platform requirements, standards and the use, optimization and troubleshooting of all features in big data platform and its tools.This role will provide Cloudera Data Platform (CDP) and Cloudera Data Services (CDS) support to implementation, maintenance and sustainment of CDP stack

name_location: CLIMATE IMPACT X PTE. LTD. · Singapore, Singapore  1 week ago  · 12 applicants
job_description:
About the job
This job is sourced from a job board. Learn More
Trusted carbon credits. Real impact.

Climate Impact X (CIX) is a Singapore-based global carbon exchange and marketplace that aims to scale the voluntary carbon market; through a joint venture by DBS, SGX, Standard Chartered and Temasek.

CIX offers distinct platforms and products that cater to the needs of different carbon credit buyers and sellers. The Exchange facilitates the sale of large-scale high-quality carbon credits through standardised contracts – catering primarily to MNCs and institutional investors. The Project Marketplace and Auction offer a curated selection of NCS projects that can meet corporate sustainability objectives. Each project on the Project Marketplace and Auction is supported by transparent impact, risk and pricing data.

We are looking for dynamic, highly-motivated and passionate individuals willing to work and learn in a fast-paced environment to be part of this exciting journey to deliver tangible and lasting impact.

For more information, please visit www.climateimpactx.com

Data Engineer

CIX is looking for an experienced Data Engineer to architect, expand and manage our cloud data infrastructure based on Microsoft Azure. The Data Engineer should bring substantial experience of best practice for cloud based data solutions. Working with in and out of house development teams the Data Engineer will be responsible for being the CIX data SME for all initiatives as well as ensuring SLAs are continually met.

Key Responsibilities

Understand business processes, applications and how data is created, stored and gathered in CIX
Have an understanding of the data being processed and assist the wider business in maximising the value and use of such data
Use big data tools and platforms to create and maintain data pipelines, making sure pipelines are robust, scalable, and reliable. Troubleshoot and rectify issues with data pipelines as necessary.
Maintain and expand CIXs existing data architecture, utilising different tools for data gathering (API, web scraping, upload capabilities), enrichment from other sources and loading in a structured form
Support CIXs data business to ensure commercial alignment with capabilities
Support proof-of-concept type work, prototypes on new data integrations and onboarding of new systems
Provide Subject Matter Expertise to the wider business on data initiatives and challenges, whether on data tools or the potential use and application of data generally

Key Requirements

More than 5 years’ hands on experience with data engineering, with experience in a business data sales environment a significant advantage
Experience with data engineering and associated tools in a cloud environment, ideally Microsoft Azure
Extensive experience working with Snowflake and Airflow
Significant SQL experience alongside some NoSQL exposure
Experience in ETL pipeline design, implementation and maintenance
Strong communication skills, including with non-technical business stakeholders
Ideally experience in data engineering within the financial services/FinTech space
Ideally experience in data commercialisation and distribution

CIX is an equal opportunity employer committed to diversity and inclusion.

We seek your understanding that only shortlisted candidates will be contacted.

Desired Skills and Experience
Microsoft Azure, Sustainability, Web Scraping, Airflow, Big Data, Pipelines, Architect, Hadoop, ETL, Data Engineering, Climate, SQL, Data Architecture, Pricing, Catering, Databases

About the job
This job is sourced from a job board. Learn More
About EDHECinfra

EDHECinfra is a provider of market indices, benchmarks and valuation analytics for investors in unlisted infrastructure equity and private debt. EDHECinfra maintains the infraMetrics® platform: an online information system that gives access to key market indices including the infra300® and infra100® series. InfraMetrics® also includes a wealth of valuation data and analytics, risk metrics, a fund strategy analysis tool providing robust performance quartiles for any segment, strategy or vintage, and peer group analyses allowing investors to compare themselves against comparable segments of the market.

Role

We are looking for someone to work with Marketing and Client Services to enhance and maintain our corporate website https://edhec.infrastructure.institute

The Responsibilities Would Be As Follows

 Create visually appealing pages along with basic mock-ups to facilitate discussions with stakeholders.
 Maintain the website and ensure high availability
 Migrate our documentation website (https://docs.edhecinfra.com) from Confluence to the corporate website
 Applying SEO principles including meta tags, scripts, site navigation, structured data, image optimization, mobile-friendly UI.
 Improving loading speed and website responsiveness, make sure all website elements are fully responsive.
 Working with various plug-ins and widgets, including Monster Insights, AIOSEO and WP forms, EventOn and other.
 Provide seamless interaction between WP site and Salesforce (via WPforms, events etc.)
 Provide website analytics and main traffic stats.

Requirements

 At least 2 years of experience creating websites using Wordpress
 Good eye for design aesthetics e.g. margin, padding, font sizes, animation timing, etc.
 Ability to create good UX design
 Attention to detail
 Ability to work independently as the successful candidate would be the only person working on the website from a technical perspective
 Strong HTML and CSS skills
 Familiar with mocking tools for basic mock-ups (e.g. Adobe CS, Figma etc.)
 Experience with PHP is a plus
 Experience with MySQL is a plus
 Familiarity with LaTeX is a plus
 Experience with GA4 is a plus

Desired Skills and Experience
Aesthetics, Confluence, Web Services, CSS, PHP, Ability To Work Independently, HTML, UX Design, MySQL, JavaScript, Attention to Detail, Java, Animation, SEO, UX, Web Development, WordPress
